I just logged in to say: this is ugly as fuck and I don't talk about the overly feminine posture. His face is so wrong the lights and colors are fuking boring AND HIS FACE OMG LOOK AT THAT UGLY ASS FACE.

Icon is so ugly now it look like from the old urgot tier...

Eeeeh, I can't say I'm a big fan of his splash update. I mean dang that artist is good, but I just kinda feel like the lore and splash update wasn't necessary. {{champion:110}} 
Ya know who really needs some attention...Ezreal. {{champion:81}}  NEW VOICE LINES RITO WE WANT NEW VOICE LINES FOR THIS BEAUTIFUL CHARACTER ;>;

It's not bad, just wish it was less of a cartoon

I say this to describe art for a video game lol
So prefer the old one, smh.
